mapper.sql:
FROM shop.infrcodegroup a WHERE 1=1
AND ifcgDelNy = 1 AND ifcgDelNy = 0
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: select a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgName from shop.infrcodegroup a where 1=1 and ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
select a.ifcdSeq ,a.ifcdName ,a.ifcdDelNy from shop.infrcode a where 1=1 and ifcdSeq = #{ifcdSeq}

select count(*) from shop.infrcode a where 1=1 and ifcdDelNy=0 AND ifcgSeq =#{shIfcgSeq}
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
